content: Jiaojiang past, super convenient, direct navigation Linhai bus station. Opposite, large billboards. The environment is superb. There is a farmland in front of the gate. The price of the dish is not expensive and the weight is sufficient. The memory is especially deep, Hakka stuffed with tofu, tofu taste, soup is delicious. The ostrich egg is super big. I didn't dare to eat it at first. After eating it, I felt that it tasted good and chewed it more than eggs. I can't accept the liver, but I can't accept it, hahahaha, because the internal organs are not accepted by the average person. Two ostriches were raised at the entrance, sprouting. The environment is really not a good bar, it is recommended to travel.

Jinwei Delan Beef Ramen is a Lanzhou Ramen enterprise engaged in international ramen brand chain. The ramen culture of the company is profound, representing the highest level of Lanzhou Ramen industry. The company has gathered many top masters in Lanzhou Ramen, including ramen noodles. Mr. Liang Shunqi, the chairman of the godfather. I have eaten the golden flavor of the ramen noodles many times, and I have also eaten other ramen noodles in Lanzhou. In terms of taste, the golden flavored noodles are at the top. As for the service, the Jinweidelaa Tianshui Road shop is in the train. Near the station, many friends from other places have read many friends' comments. There is a misunderstanding. In fact, Lanzhou noodles, ordering food on the bar, lining up and waiting for meals, and eating their own meals feel poor service. This is actually the entire Lanzhou noodle industry. Industry tradition, absolutely the majority of Lanzhou Ramen uses this model. As a local ramen diners in Lanzhou, I would like to recommend Jinweide's ramen products to friends. For those who like meaty food, Jinweide's Supreme Beef Noodle is the most cost-effective. About 3 or so of beef is worth about 25, like light. The friends who eat their mushrooms are very good.

I have eaten the most perfect restaurant lunch, lunch, main course, dessert, drink, and the appetizer and main course are also equipped with wine. It is really love [color] [color] [color]. First on the bread with butter, regret not to eat, the main dish can not eat! The waiter will ask if you need to add more, but fortunately, there is no greed, hehe. The cheese and cold meat platter in the appetizer are very large, and then I can say that I like the white sauce. The appetizer is served with dry white or pink wine. The main dish was notified that there were no salmon and duck legs, and only the beef lasagna and half-baked spring chicken with potatoes were served. The potatoes are so sweet, the amount of spring chicken and lasagna is too big, and we have two girls! Finally, there are desserts, yoghurt recommended, and it is delicious, very special. Tiramisu is a bit sweet, so the black coffee that comes with it is really straightforward. When I booked it, I thought that there was only one glass of wine. I couldn’t think of two glasses of wine. It’s really worth it! The place is not big, but the decoration is very comfortable and there is no feeling of being too crowded. The price of wine is not expensive, and you can come back with friends again next time.

At the market of Xiangfu Market, every day from 3 pm to 7 pm, it is sold out. The couple are Tongan people. This small stall has been open for three years. The location is good. It is next to the food market and Wu Zhaozhi. Very small stalls, if you pass by the street you probably won't find it. Most of the street foods in Tongan are packed more, and it is normal to pack a dozen or twenty. The small dining car is still clean, all kinds of fried powder, the foam box with the belly roll is quite clean. Clam bag, the first scoop of sweet potato powder + onion + onion, the second scoop of some lean meat + a sea bream, the third scoop to cover the sweet potato powder, into the pot. Into the plate, cut into four small pieces, simmered in Xiamen's unique sweet and spicy sauce, sweet potato powder is just right, hot and crisp. The belly roll, seeing the unwrapped rolls in the foam box, seems to have horseshoes, carrots, meat and so on. The boss puts a small amount of fried powder into a small bowl, adds some water to stir it into a paste, removes a few belly yarns from the foam box, wraps them, and puts them into the pot. Mesh wrapped in special beauty. After the frying, it is also cut into several pieces, oil is not greasy, there is a crisp of horseshoe and crispy of external fried powder. The taste is not heavy, and the salinity is also my favorite. I want to eat after eating. Thirsty, a bowl of sour bamboo shoot soup to drink, only four points of soup left little, not very close to me, I feel sour taste is not enough. Or pack five or six each, and go home to share with your family.

Is there really no special hot water machine? ! Hey, in fact, the overall environment is good, but it is really not much to eat, but also to improve a lot, this time will not come again!

Love to eat spicy crabs, especially in September, how can you miss this great season of eating crabs! I have always had a special liking for the spicy crabs of Crab Song, and I like the taste of sauces. It’s a pity that I have eaten 5 times, only twice in the most fat season of the crab. But after entering the winter, you can only eat chilled, thin crabs. For Li Laojiao, I have always heard that it is not bad. It is different from the crabs and crabs. It seems that the shell is relatively hard and has not been tried. It coincides with the passing of the festival and brings the family to the restaurant. Xuanwumen branch is an old shop that has been open for more than ten years. The store faces the street, two floors above and below, and the location is very good. Especially at night, you can see the red neon lights at the Xuanwumen subway entrance. The three characters of "Li Laojiao" above are very bright. Take the subway and go south for about 200 meters, opposite Zhuangsheng Sogo Department Store. There are not many guests arriving at the hotel in the evening. Most of the clerk would take care of the guests in the upstairs private room, so they went straight to the front desk to order. Dinner can not eat anything, ordered 99 yuan / kg of spicy crabs, a total of 3, before the pot was first presented to the guests to see the crabs are fresh, looking at the vitality. The sauce is rich in flavor, and the spicy food is sweet and spicy, and I like it very much! The crab that seems to feel the hard shell is not indestructible by the chef. The outer shell so that the hardest crab claws are relatively brittle. Crab meat is very full and delicious. Although there are no yellow crabs, almost no yellow is seen, but the meat is quite full. The crab claws are particularly large, and the meat in the pliers is full and feels particularly good value. The side dishes at the bottom of the pot are celery, green bamboo shoots and peanuts, and there is no separate charge. The side dish is crispy and savoury with the sauce. The taste of the dishes is very good, the overall feeling is good! It is recommended to improve the service quality of the customers in the service lobby. It is perfect to provide the basic services such as changing dishes, providing disposable gloves and supplying boiled water.

Recently, it was discovered that brown sugar taro was also popular in Fuzhou. I often saw the chain store of brown sugar taro in the urban area. Because I have never liked to eat steamed buns and buns, but I saw that the children in the public often buy brown sugar steamed buns, and they said that they are very delicious. In the heart, they planted a grass. This grass is slowly growing. Growing up, this is not, this time through this food still red sugar Shantou shop, although the stomach has been full, but still can not help but buy a taste is a good taste. The store is located at No. 165, Bayiqi Middle Road, Taijiang District. It is close to the Children's Hospital and the Tea House World Trade Center. It is next to the Chating Station. It should be a store that has been opened for a few months, because it has not been noticed before. . This shop is different from other bun shops, the facade is small, the decoration is also simple, their shop decoration is quite small and fresh, but also can eat? There are a few small tables in the store. If you don't want to pack them, you can eat them on the spot. The brown sugar taro is quite big, a binary, as big as a slap! Very fluffy feeling, smells very fragrant, tastes, the taste of syrup is very good, the hoe is soft and soft, unlike the hoes that are usually eaten, hard and tasteless, I don't like it at all. Well, because I just had enough to eat, I took a sip, went to work, went home to eat, but unfortunately I was robbed when I got home. Of course, in addition to brown sugar taro, there are also white steamed buns, meat bags, vegetable bags, red bean bags, milk yellow bags, bamboo shoots, as well as soy milk, peanut pulp, pumpkin porridge, white fungus soup, mung bean soup, not just steamed bread? My sister decided to come to the next lunch to taste other gimmicks, buns, and see if I would fall in love with them.

The newly opened grilled fish shop at the junction of Hongqiao District and Nankai District, and those who like to eat grilled fish have a good taste. The store is not big, the decoration is relatively simple, there are only a few tables in the hall, there is only one single room, but it gives people a feeling of being warm and small. There is a very thick recipe, there are four kinds of fish, namely Jiang Tuan, Qingjiang, Black Fish and Grass Carp. The price of each fish is different per kg. The setting is very reasonable. The taste is heavy, medium, micro and not hot. Kind of choice. Looking at photos of all tastes, it’s ridiculous! There are also delicious side dishes and drinks. The side dishes can be ordered in one piece or in combination. It is recommended that the side dishes be combined and the types are more. The cutlery is neatly placed in the sterilizer, plastic tableware with its own logo printed on it. There are two kinds of cold dishes, namely, the Wizard of Oz and the fairy scent: The Wizard of Oz is the seaweed, which is both base and refreshing before eating the grilled fish. The fairy nectar is a canned peach and condensed milk tortoise, a cold dish for all ages, everyone Quite like it. I ate four Qingjiang-style grilled fish. Each fish is crispy and crispy outside. It is completely flavored, the fish skin is crispy and the fish is tender and tender. Everyone is full of praise. Because everyone can not be too spicy, so the taste is selected in the spicy and non-spicy, and finally determined four, respectively, the red sleeves add fragrant, lychee spicy, French kiss and ecstasy. The red sleeves are fragrant, the spicy cheese can be chosen; the lychee spicy is sweet and spicy, the spicy is moderate, the lychee is spicy, the French kiss is black pepper, the black pepper is thick. Black pepper flavor; ecstasy 18 is not spicy, with wild vegetables and likes. How to eat grilled fish can be less side dishes and cakes, a grilled fish with two side dishes and two kinds of cakes, good to eat. The drink is sour plum soup, and finally the store also gives a bouquet of chrysanthemum Sydney, the two kinds of drinks with the best to eat grilled fish, both hot and succulent. A whole store feels good, and now there are group purchases. I have a chance to taste the spicy taste. Who told me to be a child who loves spicy food.

Xinyihui, a very authentic Singaporean restaurant, opened a new one in Hongkou Football Stadium. Beverage ordered red bean sand ice: 330ml, made a good look, coconut milk flavor, with mint leaves on it, red beans below. That is, the straw is too thin and is always blocked by red beans. very delicious. Sha Jiang Chicken: three seasonings, one spicy, one soy sauce, one ginger. The meat is delicious and tender. There are also cucumbers. Prawn Mango Salad: There are apples, yellow peaches, mangoes, and three prawns. Refreshing pepper crab: a big one. A bit salty. The pepper is full-bodied and the meat is full. So sweet. Curry prawns: authentic curry, and bone-baked tea with ingredients such as pumpkin: very good. Tasty. Put the fritters. The characteristics of Singapore. Barbecue platter: lamb chops, roast chicken, pork neck. Delicious. Also ordered fried noodles: very rich, with prawns. Dessert. Durian puff features bursting. Eat hot. There is also a durian ice cream. Very good value for money. The opening is also a discount of 6.8 percent. Come back in a few days.

It is worth mentioning that the snack platter is really great, a large plate with onion rings, chicken fillets, fried chicken and so on. Lamma Island is the third largest island in Hong Kong, China, and the famous actor Zhou Run is born. Summer and Autumn is the best time to go to Lamma Island. In the off-season of Hong Kong tourism in the spring, you can avoid the crowds and choose to travel at this time. In the summer, enjoy the coolness of the water in Nanxun Island, cool in the autumn, and feel the slow pace of life on the island. In the winter, Lamma Island has warm sunshine and secluded paths. May-September is the typhoon season, and you must make a safe travel plan. There is only a ferry to the transportation to Lamma Island. There are two piers in the south and the north on Lamma Island, namely Yung Shue Wan and Sok Kwu Wan. There are ferries from Central and Aberdeen, as well as free boats from the Rainbow Seafood Restaurant. In addition, the island does not have a car, the mountain road is narrow and twisted, and bicycles are the most common means of transportation. Boarding position: 1. Central Pier No. 9, the journey takes about 40 minutes. 2. The Aberdeen passenger location is at the public pier next to the Yigangju Waterfront Park. The journey takes approximately 20 minutes. Located in the northwestern part of Lamma Island, Yung Shue Bay is one of the main villages on Lamma Island. It is only 30 minutes by ferry from Central. Yung Shue Bay is home to a number of craft boutiques, bars and small restaurants serving continental and Asian specialties. Visitors can enjoy the stunning sea views while enjoying a delicious seafood feast. Apart from the Yung Shue Wan in the north, Sok Kwu Wan in the south is another major village on the island. It takes about 30 minutes to take a ferry from Central to Sok Kwu Wan. Sok Kwu Wan has a pleasant view. Above the bay, there are many high-altitude open-air restaurants where you can taste seafood dishes, fried crabs, steamed shrimps, crispy fried squid and ginger onion steamed fish. Tianhong Restaurant is a famous seafood restaurant here. The seafood here is fresh and full, the cooking method is relatively simple, and the original flavor of seafood is preserved. Because it is in 2012, the price can no longer be used as a reference.

Fengnian Enema is an old name on Longfusi Street, a famous old state-run restaurant. His family's enema is best known. The location is on Longfusi Street in Dongcheng District, bus 110 to Dongsi Road South Station. Get off at Dongsi Station of Metro Line 5. Convenient transportation. Fengnian enema was earlier in the east of Longfusi Street. Later, it was relocated after the renovation of Longfusi Street. It moved to the west and was close to Baikui. They are all small face faces, but they are very hot every day. They are always lined up. The restaurant decoration is simple and simple, without too much decoration, and the environment is clean and hygienic. There are many bags of starch for enema in the store. Up to now, 10 yuan a plate, from the east to the west. I have been eating enema all the time. His family also sells raw sausages and buys a few pounds from the store, and comes back to eat it. Enema is an old Beijing traditional snack. In the past, there were often hawkers on the streets of old Beijing to run this food. It is a favorite snack that the public loves. The enema began to spread in the Ming Dynasty. It has been recorded: "The powdered pork intestines should be fried, the shovel chopsticks and saucers should be picked up by one shoulder, and the special flavor children can buy them and pass through several sections of the oblique road." There are two types of enema: one is a large enema, washed with pig fat, and mixed with various raw materials such as high-quality flour, red yeast water, clove, soybean meal, etc., poured into the intestines, cooked and cut into small pieces, used The pig is fried and cokeed with salted garlic sauce. The taste is crispy and salty. The other is called a small enema. It is made into a thick paste with starch and red yeast water and bean curd. After steaming, cut into small pieces, fry with pigs, and drink with salted garlic. This is the enema of his family, the garlic juice is also very delicious, made with cold water, salt, garlic and so on. The enema of his family is a small enema. Cooked enema 10 yuan a plate. Raw enema 12 yuan a pound, another sale of millet porridge 2 yuan a bowl. Each piece of enema should be thinner in the middle and thicker on both sides. Slowly fry with pig net oil. The middle side is soft and soft. It is very easy to dissolve with garlic sauce. The enema is tender and tender. It is eaten with a small bamboo toothpick. The staff is thoughtful and welcoming. Although prices have risen and changed with factors such as prices, staff wages, ingredients and rents, the constant change is the love of old-fashioned food, and perhaps there are good memories of childhood.

In late autumn in Beijing, the weather is getting colder and colder, and the sudden drop in temperature makes people more willing to eat hot food. The light dishes are too monotonous, and the hot food is too thick. It is better to start with a healthy and delicious Mediterranean dish, open your stomach and try new choices. Mediterranean cuisine should include dishes cooked in Mediterranean countries such as Greece, Spain, Turkey, southern France, and southern Italy. The diet is mostly based on seafood, combined with vegetables and fruits, whole grains, beans, etc., and high-quality olive oil is the main cooking oil. It is the representative of the healthy eating culture in the world today. ALEX&WENDY'S is located at the East Gate of Guanhu International, No. 88, East 4th Ring North Road. It is a place where people can relax and enjoy the eye-catching flowers and green plants. If you can soak up the sun in the courtyard in the warm afternoon, it is a luxury to spend time. Smoked salmon salad, 48 yuan. Salmon is still quite different in the method of smoking, which is divided into cold smoke and hot smoke. Cold smoke is the use of low temperature to slowly push the woody incense, so that the salmon is not cooked, and the elasticity is still. Hot smoked is a high-temperature fireworks that smokes the whole salmon until it is cooked. This is a traditional Nordic method of cooking salmon. The process is very natural, without adding other ingredients, highlighting the original flavor of the salmon. The fish is still elastic, with a faint scent and a very good taste. Italian red and white cold plate, 38 yuan. The most refreshing and refreshing cheese is the mozzarella, the soft and soft mozzarella, made from buffalo, and the taste is lighter. Italian style meatballs, 48 ​​yuan. The succulent meatballs with rich tomato pate are appetizing! Spanish olive fried shrimp, 58 yuan. Tender shrimps with olive oil, eat a different flavor! White wine is cooked at 58 yuan. The 蛤蜊 treatment is quite clean, and the savory and delicious dishes are enriched with a special layer of white wine, which is delicious! Mixed paella, 218 yuan. Full of platters, scallops, prawns, green mussels, squid and other seafood, gathered together. The fresh shrimp is large and plump, and the meat is firm and full of juice. The refreshing taste and the sandwiched rice are intertwined in the mouth to create a unique taste. The excellent marine flavor makes people want to stop. Aussie imported West Cold Steak, 158 yuan. The three-cooked beef is juicy and tender, accompanied by a glass of red wine, and the taste buds reach a new experience. Pan-fried Norwegian salmon, 108 yuan. Salmon has a high nutritional value and is also delicious. One of the best ways to eat salmon is to fry. After marinating, the sautéed salmon is too tasty. The inner layer is soft and sandwiched, and the taste is very good! The variety of desserts in the store can not be missed! Pretend to feel the color and aroma of the Mediterranean, bringing a new journey to the taste buds.

This cat cafe in London is located in the Shoreditch area of ​​East London, very close to Brick Lane. Recently I heard that their afternoon tea High Tea package can also be booked on the working day, I can't wait to taste it, so now is the test report time! The facade of this store is quite big, and behind one of the big glass, you can see those cute little guys, so you will not miss it. Almost all passing people can't help but look inside. Before entering the cafe (before seeing the cats), everyone will first wait in a small room with some cat-related peripherals and two sinks. The staff of the café will let all the guests sign the name they left when they made the appointment. After that, they will explain to us the precautions after entering the café, including not picking up cats and cats, and don’t touch them when they sleep or eat. Also remember to turn off the flash and so on when taking pictures. Finally, in order to ensure the health of the cat, they will let each guest wash their hands before they can officially enter the coffee shop inside. There are two floors in the café. We are arranged on the basement level. This floor is bigger. There are some retro sofas and cabinets around. Of course, there are also various tables, toys and toilet boxes for cats. Haha, when it comes to this, it is estimated that you will think, so many cats in the store will not have a stink? It was normal to have this doubt. I thought about this before I went there, but the moment I entered the cafe from the hut, my first impression was that "there is a lot of incense here, there is no animal smell at all." (By the way, the second impression is that "the cat is not as much as I imagined"). I saw almost four cats on the first floor, but they were all sleeping. There were three downstairs, two of them sleeping, and one cat who was younger than last year was walking around. In fact, the cats living in the cafe show 10 to 12 on their official website, and each has their own account on Twitter. I guess there are only a few sleeping on the high-rise table in the store, so I don’t have see. After talking about the cat, let’s talk about afternoon tea (after all, people are still in the afternoon tea restaurant). After each guest is seated, there is a menu of afternoon tea on the table, and the waiter will deliver the drinks and food on the menu to your desk one after another. The afternoon tea set is fixed (there is a vegetarian menu to choose from, but it is clear at the time of booking), the only thing you need to spot yourself is hot drinks, because there are many options. When you enter the cafe, you can go around and find a cat to play. In order to ensure that every guest can have a "playing cat addiction", the staff will continue to bring the cat to the front of the guests, play with them, "talk" with them, and give the cat a little good reward from time to time. In order to prevent all the cats from sleeping, so that the guests do not have the opportunity to interact with the cats, the staff are not easy. Generally, the waiters in the cafe only need to send the food to the guests table, but because they still live here. With a lot of cute little friends, you need someone to be responsible for entertaining them, plus creating "photo opportunities" for the guests to take pictures with cats. In the process of playing with the cat, you will start to drink on your desk. First of all, it is a glass of champagne with a sweet taste and a hint of strawberry. Next, someone will come over and ask if you want to drink hot drinks, coffee and tea, etc. I ordered a mocha. Next is the protagonist of afternoon tea! The three shelves were on the scene. The first layer is the cake (the brownie tastes very good inside), the second layer is the thinker (too big we can't finish), and the third layer is the salty snacks and sandwiches. These foods can be eaten and then renewed. The afternoon tea here, the content is relatively simple, there is no particularly amazing food (because their family's focus is not good afternoon tea). I was not very cold with desserts. It was a meat eater, but the sandwiches in the afternoon tea had no meat, only smoked salmon, and then I still didn't like to eat fish, so I had a little disappointment. However, I am here mainly to see cats, of course, I will not compare the afternoon tea here with the afternoon tea in other five-star hotels. It is closed on Wednesdays and there is a cat yoga class in the evening. In addition to normal refreshment consumption, a tip of £5 is also required. It is recommended to go to see the cat can make an appointment through the official website! ! !

In the northwest corner of Keelung, Taiwan, Batou is a natural harbor. The nearby sea is rich in catches. It has been an indispensable source of food for local people in the early days. In 1974, Taiwan built a large fishing port in Badouzi. It officially started construction in 1975 and was completed in 1979. The entire fishing port is divided into two phases. The first phase is the narrowly-defining Eight Dzizi Fishing Port. The second phase, also known as the Bisha Fishing Port, is a multi-purpose fishing port oriented to leisure and entertainment. In addition to the fishing and direct sales center for the consumer to buy, the fishing port also has There is a cooked food area where fresh fish can be handed over to the store for processing. After the completion of the second phase of the project, the Badouzi Fishing Port has become an important tourist attraction in Keelung City, attracting a large number of foreign tourists on holidays. The owner of Yadougang Frying is from Taiwan, and it also brings the food of the fishing port of Taiwan’s Badouzi. It is fried with small seafood, which is delicious and delicious. The first store of Badougang Frying in Xiamen is on Jiangtou West Road. Recently, it opened a new store in Mingfa. It is on the first floor of Jinyi Cinema. The store is not big, but it is neat and tidy, bright and clean. There are many varieties sold in the store. There are crabs, various kinds of shrimps, shrimps, scallops, squid, and many of them are fried for the first time. I don’t think it’s delicious. I don’t lose the steam and white that Xiamen people often eat. The practice of burning and soy sauce. And the price is not expensive, the price is very high, it is a good choice for snacks and staying up late. This time, the fried shrimp monkey is eaten in the mainland, but it is a famous snack in Taiwan. It is a specialty of Lukang. The shrimp monkey looks strange, the head is like a dragonfly, the Taiwanese is a belly monkey, and the tail is like Shrimp, may be named after it. After frying, the fragrant and fragrant is crispy and can be eaten together with the shell. It tastes good and is a good dish for nightingale.

Yifang Qixin Dapan Rice is located beside the parking lot of Zhenye Building, No. 108 Hubin North Road. Is Yifang Qixin's name a special one? In fact, it is a combination of the names of the boss and the boss and the sister. The boss is a owner who has been operating a farm for more than ten years. He has a Yungu farm in Dafeng Village, Hangxikou Town, Longyan. He was rated as the top ten self-driving destination for Xiamen citizens on weekends. The farms use the characteristics of hot spring water to grow vegetables. Many Xiamen citizens who have visited the farm have praised the farm food. Unfortunately, they can't eat such delicious food in Xiamen. Because the boss opened such a Yifang Qixin big pot rice in Ludao, the ingredients are all from their own farms, and even the water for cooking is also the hot spring water transportation of the farm. It is hygienic, safe and reassuring from the source of the ingredients. Yifang Qixin Big Pot Rice is currently the main farmhouse food buffet. It is 55 yuan in the afternoon and 68 yuan in the evening. It provides the staple food of rice and rice noodles, organic taro, dried bamboo shoots, dumplings, stir-fried vegetables and meat. Dry and other hot dishes, as well as a variety of delicious soups such as tiger tail round big bone soup, black garlic head pork soup, ginger candy sweet potato soup, and more desserts such as burning grass and pudding. I saw the recommendation of the Ma Honeycomb Raiders and the rating of the review was very high, I did not hesitate to pass, I did not expect the first time in my life to be slaughtered! The matter goes as follows: Starting from Hemu this afternoon (2015.10.2), it has been more than eight o'clock by car to Burqin. I thought it was Burqin, and I didn’t care too much. The five of us ate for a while and called for checkout. The proprietress came over, and Ma Li’s calculation, said 1260. We are very surprised how these dishes are 1260? It is necessary to look at the bill. The proprietress took the bill to me and showed it to us. How do I see the grilled fish? Not 280? I and the boss wife theory, she is very tough, that is 560, not 280, is 280 pounds, two pounds is 560. There is never 280 one account that says everyone is doing this. I immediately agreed with her, and also affirmed that I had to complain. After a while, she knew that she was losing money. She said that if she didn’t know us, she would avoid 280 and let us give 980. I looked at the bill carefully and found that several vegetarian dishes were 68. At this point, I am speechless. Who did not ask for the price of vegetarian food? Later, according to the bill price, there are still a few bottles of beer, carefully calculated, only 938! Just questioning the proprietress, according to her bill, how is the 980 calculated? The proprietress began to argue that it was wrong. This sushi is near the friend's house, because it is a foodie with friends, and prefers to eat sushi. He went to the trial business that day. Fourth, this service, on the day of the trial operation, seems a bit messy, but today it is completely different, the waiter is very polite, the wrong dish was sent directly to us to eat, I can see that the boss is training the waiter Time is very hard. Speaking of the boss, I remember that my friend asked the boss why he wanted to open a small sushi restaurant here. To be honest, the boss is doing what he wants to do well. This spirit and philosophy, I think, is worthy of admiration. Therefore, in this busy world, I hope that we can all stick to what we have been insisting on. I hope this sushi is getting better and better, I will frequent it in the future!

[Source of Hot Pot] At the beginning of the article, I first applied a tacky language. The Chinese hot pot culture can be said to have a long history. As early as the Eastern Han Dynasty, there was a record of people eating hot pot. As for when it was the source, it was difficult to say. There is a conclusion. Hot pot, because of the "water", it is inevitable that there is a sound of screaming, so in ancient times, it was called "an antique 羹". Regarding the hot pot, I want to say two interesting things. The first one is a famous poem, "Let Liu Xun" written by Bai Juyi in the Tang Dynasty. The poem wrote "Green ant new glutinous wine, red mud and small fire 垆 (furnace). Can drink a cup without." When you analyze this poem, everyone will say that on a snowy day, Bai Juyi and his friends are sitting around the small fire, drinking freshly brewed sweet wine and talking about the world. This poem expresses the deep feelings between the poet and the friend in a very simple language. It is one of Bai Juyi's famous poems and an excellent poem to praise friendship. However, I am not coming to the language class today. I would like to remind everyone that we can pay attention to another point, that is, the "small stove" mentioned in the poem. According to later studies, in fact, the so-called "small stove" is our hot pot. In other words, as early as more than a thousand years ago, "small hot pot" became popular, and it was also put into poetry by the great poet. It has been passed down to the present, everyone thinks, is this an interesting thing? Another thing may be familiar to everyone, and it is the legend of Kublai Khan. It is rumored that on the way of a marching war, Kublai suddenly wanted to eat lamb, and know where to go to find cooked lamb during the march, but the life is not to be violated. A clever chef (said that he is smart, I think it is to lift him up, people will always utter a genius-like imagination in the rush, otherwise life is not going to be). Cut the lamb into thin slices and put it in boiling water. Then add chopped green onion and other spices, and the results will be overwhelmed after eating. Since then, the classic cuisine of "Lamb mutton" has been born, and it has become the heart of many diners. Speaking of it, we can eat mutton and mutton today, but also thanks to Kublai Khan’s whim? It’s pretty fun to think about it. [The beauty of hot pot] It is a beautiful thing to eat hot pot, especially in the hot pot. The environment of this shop is not special, the store is not very big, but people are not fighting the external "face value", but the internal "conservation" - people's ingredients are not to say! [Australian B-class raw food] The first debut, immediately shocked the audience. You know, in the hot pot restaurant, it is rare to meet the ingredients that can be eaten raw (some stores don’t say raw food, they are frightened when they are cooked), and often only high-end restaurants can find them. I didn't expect to see raw beef here! Its raw beef, each piece can be said to be as thin as a flap, gently lifted with chopsticks, carefully placed in the mouth, a bite, sweet, smooth, only the unique milk flavor of beef, But there is no scent of raw meat! Of course, if you can't accept the most primitive way of eating, you can also lick a little Vasabi (Japanese transliteration, in fact, mustard), use the pungent pungency to cover up the psychological discomfort, and also open your nose and mouth, below Prepare for the "war". In short, no matter how you eat, this dish has exceeded the hot pot category I have in mind, and must give five stars! [Australian top-class beef] is not common in general hot pot restaurants, but in fact the texture of this part of the meat is much stronger than ordinary beef. Don't look at the name of the product with the word "upper brain". It is not a beef brain. In fact, it is the meat of the back of the cow. There is only a little bit of cow in the back neck, so this dish is very precious. This beef is also ultra-thin, even if it is chopped off with chopsticks, it will be broken, so remind everyone to take it lightly, not to destroy the beauty of others. When you are licking meat, you want to have some "Sven", a piece of cockroaches, but you don't have to get used to it in peacetime. Putting the meat into the pot, it is really violent. Put each piece of meat into the pot, swing it three times to the left and right, about three to five seconds to get out of the pot, let the meat grow old, lose its tenderness, and lose the essence of this meat, everyone Don't forget. As for the taste, I can only say that it is definitely more beautiful than the fat cow you usually eat. [Australian top beef tongue] is another beef that I can hardly forget. Unlike the previous fat, it is best to use a small fire when yak tongue, put it in the bottom of the pot when it is not boiling, and cook it instead of cooking it to get the most beautiful. The taste of the beef tongue is also different from other beef. It is a relatively tough feeling, more chewy, and the meat is more compact. The ancients have endless words. I want to say that the beef tongue is "endless" and the charm long. [New Zealand Lamb Star] is my favorite dish. This mutton has been shocking from the shape, and behind the mighty arrogant, domineering name is a very delicate and gentle taste. I eat glutinous meat and rarely use the term "gentle". In the face of the Lamb Star, all the habits are broken, and the experience has disappeared. The only thing that stays in my mind is "delicious". Words. This lamb is not as strong as Xinlong. It is not as overbearing as Donglaishun. Behind the delicate meat is the peace of the "shadow makeup". I racked my brains to find a proper word to describe it. Finally, I found that A "gentle" is enough to sum up its beauty. [New Yorker cut] is another lamb that I love. This dish has a higher price in the products of mutton. The big one is 32. I think it is expensive in the word "hand cut". Because it is hand cut, the taste of this mutton is more "hard", it will not be imported, but this does not affect the taste of the lamb, but because of the slightly tenacity, people can eat more energetic. This hand cuts the lamb, not as difficult to bite as the beef tongue, and unlike most products, it is not chewed in the mouth. It can be described as a "neutral" dish for young and old, recommended by four stars. (unfinished, see response)

Speaking of hot pot, every Batu people can have their own set of opinions, from the dishes to the bottom of the pot, or from the environment to the service, but the change is not the same, the most important thing is the taste. Even if the individual has a personal hobby, the taste is always the first goal pursued by everyone. Today, the shop is located in the Dawei Ecological Hot Pot near Liangjiaxiang Station. [Location] The absolute location is close to the Liangjiaxiang station, but since it is in the back street, there are not many hot long queues in the hot pot restaurant on the street. In fact, after a step, it is the real lobby. The overall space is much more than expected, and there is a private room upstairs. The decoration style is the old Chongqing hot pot style popular in the last two years. The bench and the square table of the imitation soil stove are equipped with copper pot. The interior of the wooden and imitation bricks is decorated with red lanterns. Aesthetic fatigue is inevitable. The environment has nothing to do. [Quality of Service] The enthusiasm of the waiters is not very high, but they can basically be on call, and the requirements will be met as much as possible. Need to remind everyone that there is no self-service snacks and fruit at noon, only available at dinner time, this is a penalty. [Dish taste] #鸳鸯锅# There is a fried squid in the bottom of the broth, which is considered to be kind. The butter used in the bottom of the red soup pot is too heavy. After the entrance, it will feel very greasy in the mouth. It is not very comfortable to eat in the stomach for a long time. Other dishes have no special features, they are common dishes in hot pot restaurants, and they do not have their own special dishes. The overall weight of the dishes is relatively good, especially the large amount of vegetarian food. The freshness is acceptable. [Value for money] In the Chengdu, the price of the dish is slightly lower in the middle. The review network has a vouchers group purchase, and the price will be more peaceful after the coupon. [Summary] The feeling that Dawei gave me is summed up as a mediocrity. Taste, dishes, environment, service, no highlights, no particularly obvious shortcomings. The only bright spot may be that the price/performance ratio is not bad. This kind of hot pot restaurant that relies on cost-effectiveness to fight the world, according to past experience, can not be maintained for a long time. As time goes by, when the food and service decline, it will soon reach a very dangerous situation. There are still a lot of homework to be done to make a hot pot in Chengdu. Another: I have eaten twice with my friends. After that, I have developed stomach upset. I personally feel that there is room for improvement in the bottom of the pot. The proportion of butter and the type and amount of pepper in the fried ingredients need to be finely adjusted.
